properties.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 5:22AM AKST until January 17 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Visibility will be reduced to one
half mile or less at times.

* WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast.

* WHEN...6 AM Wednesday to midnight Thursday night.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will
cause areas of blowing and drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of
blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST THURSDAY NIGHT
